title: The Biting Cold
description: A grief so deep, she was lost. A love so strong, she was found.What price would you pay?Dr. Amanda Lloyd, a dying psychiatrist, is desperate to give the only testimony that will keep the criminal mastermind of a human trafficking network in jail. She can’t spare time for the handsome patient who claims to be a vampire. Unless what he offers her is exactly what she needs…
author: Mark Henwick
